thread.section_title: LegacyHeadstones.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LegacyHeadstones.com | legacyheadstones.com
thread.title: Vicki Underwood

author: Vicki Underwood
title: Vicki Underwood
text: I went on line and chose Legacy to do my daughter's grave marker. I submitted my order. Scott from Legacy called to discuss my order with me. I sent pictures of how I wanted her headstone designed. They redid my design and sent it to me for approval. I approved it and they began the order for the head stone to be completed. The shipping was free. The customer service I received was great. They communicated at each step of the process. The price was reasonable or I could not have completed closure on my daughter's death!!
